definition: to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment

sentences.english: Its underlying purposes and inwardness quite worth pondering.
sentences.chinese: 其背后的目的与深意也颇为值得玩味。

sentences.english: It is worthwhile to ruminate over his remarks.
Smartphones go mainstream, but the devil’s in the details.
sentences.chinese: 智能手机在主流化，其中细节更值得玩味。

sentences.english: The possible existence of andesites on Mars is intriguing.
sentences.chinese: 火星上可能有安山岩存在，这很值得玩味。

sentences.english: The uniqueness of Christ is a tricky one for a start.
sentences.chinese: 首先，基督的唯一性值得玩味。

sentences.english: The palace lantern on road of look up garden all the time by the netizen fine fine ponder.
sentences.chinese: 瞻园路上的宫灯一直被网友细细玩味。

sentences.english: Sees a play many to the stage platform is one kind regarding play's pondering with life whiling away the time.
sentences.chinese: 到戏楼看戏更多是一种对于戏的玩味和生活的消闲。

sentences.english: He sat by the pond chewing the cud of the criticisms coming from his manager.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在池塘旁边，仔细玩味着经理对他的批评。
